entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
